instructions

1) 00432820 -> 000000 00010 00011 00101 00000 100000
               r type r2    r3    r5          operation -> add
               add $r2, $r3, $r5               
                   64,  96   = 16*10 = 160

2) 00a33022 -> 000000 00101 00011 00110 00000 100010  (r-type)
                      rs=5  rt=3  rd=6        func=subtract
                      16    64    -48

I addedd) 0128302F -> 000000 01001 01000 00110 00000 101111 (r-type)
                      rs=9  rt=8  rd=6        func=mul
                      66    50    

3) 8c240000 -> 100011 00001 00100 0000000000000000 (load/store)
               35     r1=20 r4=16    address = 0
               lw     $r1, 0 ($r4)    
               result = 37

4) ac240004 -> 101011 00001 00100 0000000000000100 
               43     r1=20 r4=37 address = 4
               sw     $r1 ,4 ($r4)  
               address 4+20 = 24 will hold 37                               

5) 1063fffb -> 000100 00011 00011 1111 1111 1111 1011
               beq    $r3, $r3 $offset = FFFB 
               equal pc will be updated 
               
6) 00000000 -> 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000

7) 22000000 -> 0010 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
